name: Clin T Distal Bile Duct
title: Clinical T
notes:
**Note 1:**  Distal bile duct tumors arise between the junction of the cystic duct-bile duct and the ampulla of Vater.  The classification includes tumors developing in congenital choledochal cysts and tumors arising in the intrapancreatic portion of the common bile duct.

**Note 2:**  Involvement within the  porta hepatis is coded according to the structures involved:  portal vein, common hepatic artery, and common hepatic duct.
